data.title: Rational&Strategic
data.description: My first history teacher told me that there are five simple questions that can answer everything: Where, when, who, how and why. Until now I use them as tools in my everyday life.

data.title: Problem Solver & Invent
data.description: 10+ mid-to-large size projects have thought me that every problem has a solution.

data.title: All-rounded&Balanced
data.description: Although it's really hard to keep the balance - there are so many interesting stuff to do!
